import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import HistoryAPI from '../../API/HistoryAPI'; function DetailHistory(props) { const { id } = useParams(); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [information, setInformation] = useState({}); const [totalBill, setTotalBill] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const response = await HistoryAPI.getDetail(id); console.log(response.products); setCart(response.products); // console.log(response); setInformation(response.user); setTotalBill(response.totalBill); }; fetchData(); }, []); return (

Detail Order

  1. Detail

Information Order

ID User: {information.userId}

Full Name: {information.name}

Phone: {information.phone}

Address: {information.address}

Total: {new Intl.NumberFormat('vn-VN', {style: 'currency', currency: 'VND'}).format(totalBill)}

{cart && cart.map((value) => ( ))}
{' '} ID Product {' '} Image {' '} Name {' '} Price {' '} Count
{value.idProduct}
{value.nameProduct}
{value.priceProduct}
{value.count}
); } export default DetailHistory;
